caption: This is the live performance of an Irish folk music piece. There is no singer. The fiddle is playing an upbeat solo while the bass guitar is playing a complex bass line using the tapping technique. The atmosphere is joyful. This piece could be used in the soundtrack of a documentary that has scenes of rapid movement.
